import React from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col,Image, ListGroup,Card, Button, ListGroupItem} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const ProductScreen = ( ) => { const params = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 ) } export default ProductScreen
